channel.title: Comments on: Muslim Day at Capitol – prayerful connections

item.title: By: Muslims Are Literally Asked If They 'Beat Their Wives' Before They Can Meet GOP Lawmaker – Liberal View News
item.dc:creator: Muslims Are Literally Asked If They 'Beat Their Wives' Before They Can Meet GOP Lawmaker – Liberal View News
item.description: […] Council on American-Islamic Relations (CAIR) of Oklahoma organized its annual Muslim Day at the Capitol to offer Muslim communities across the state an opportunity to meet with elected officials. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Council on American-Islamic Relations (CAIR) of Oklahoma organized its annual Muslim Day at the Capitol to offer Muslim communities across the state an opportunity to meet with elected officials. […]
